name: Dino VS The Volcano
description:
Your Dino friend went to explore the nearby island's mountain, only to learn it's actually a volcano. Collect the needed tools like a raft, sharktooth pickaxe and a big ol' fish to rescue your friend.

Use arrow keys to move, space to pick up or use items, and enter to open your inventory. controls also mentioned in game. Press ESC to quit.

There's a bug found where if you collide into something and change your arrow key inputs too fast as you collide, it may make your dino character start gliding across the screen. It should be fixed if you just take your hands off the keys and collide into something else.

Secret Area Hint Some Doors are closed. Maybe one will open. Keep checking as you progress. Secret Area Solution When all your items are gold, a door in the area with 4 houses will open.
